content: {"name": "East Flat Rock First Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Anyone can receive food from this ministry. We offer a wide variety of food each month. We pack the food boxes ahead of time.  This allows us to run the giveaway as a drive through and you never have to leave your car.\n\nEach month, unless specified, arrive by 10:30 a.m. We will stop serving at 11:30 a.m. If you would like a reminder call the day before each distribution day, please call the church office. We can add you to our Call Alert system.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.eastflatrockfbc.com/manna-food-distribution", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2227 Spartanburg Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "East Flat Rock", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28726", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2847526, "longitude": -82.4240239}, "phones": [{"number": "(828) 692-0765", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Grab and Go Groceries"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
